entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
